video.title: Lost & Found Music Studios
video.synopsis: Teen singers-songwriters in an elite music program form bonds of friendship, creativity and romance while turning their passion into their profession.

episodes.synopsis: The kids throw a party for the graduates going on tour. Leia gets the wrong idea when her crush, Luke, performs a love song written by bandmate John.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: Leia is miffed when best friend Rachel's song is picked over hers for use in the upcoming auditions. Eva helps Jude find a theme for his music video.
episodes.title: See Through Me

episodes.synopsis: Mr T. helps the band record a demo. A dancer who wants to sing, a kid from a rough neighborhood and a small-town songwriter are invited to audition.
episodes.title: Play the Record

episodes.synopsis: The first day of auditions include a singer who tried out the year before, a pianist smothered by his stage mom and a girl who learned the wrong song.
episodes.title: Heart & Soul

episodes.synopsis: One auditioner wants to break the rules. Clara's nerves take over. Isaac shows off his stage presence. John fights to give Annabelle a second chance.
episodes.title: Invincible

episodes.synopsis: The veterans give the newbies a tour. Leia worries when a new girl hits it off with Luke. Mary pushes Eva to go beyond her comfort zone.
episodes.title: All About the Music

episodes.synopsis: John tries to conceal his new "living situation" from Michelle. Clara must confront her insecurities when she suffers a bad bout of stage fright.
episodes.title: Day After Day

episodes.synopsis: A celebrity visit ignites a heated rivalry between Jude and Rachel. Annabelle tries to establish herself as a member of the in crowd.
episodes.title: Dancing in the Rain

episodes.synopsis: Isaac and Jude find a mysterious songbook. Maggie, Leia, Rachel and Annabelle forge deeper bonds when they decide to share secrets.
episodes.title: Potent Love

episodes.synopsis: Leia's first date goes awry. John and Luke decide to visit their old piano teacher. Jude tries to help Eva by setting up a private recording session.
episodes.title: Heart Shape

episodes.synopsis: To impress her peers, Clara lies about being the writer of a song she performs at Open Stage. John must face a fear when Luke gives him an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Freebird

episodes.synopsis: Leia's diva demands threaten Maggie's chance to open for a popular band. Isaac worries when his shady brother starts hanging around the studio.
episodes.title: Sunrise

episodes.synopsis: Eva shows Clara a way to redeem herself. Maggie breaks her Luke truce with Leia. Michelle overhears John's true feelings for her during band practice.
episodes.title: Callin' Callin' Pt 1

episodes.synopsis: The girls' band misses Maggie. Michelle has an enlightening conversation with John's grandmother. The boys' first paid gig isn't what they'd imagined.
episodes.title: Callin' Callin' Pt 2
